ai-patthana15.15:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.15:0.3_0: under the inner skin of the flesh,
ai-patthana15.15:1.1_0: Because it doesn’t cause or reason to teach the Dhamma for a specific condition.
ai-patthana15.15:2.1_0: Because of insteadity, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.15:3.1_0: or to teach one who has not caused the Dhamma,
ai-patthana15.15:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
